evaluations.title: Evaluation
evaluations.execution-assessment-sheet:
EVALUATION SHEET
of the employee who exercises the function of execution
evaluations.managing-assessment-sheet:
EVALUATION SHEET
of the employee who exercises the function of execution

execution.1: The ability to fully perform the duties of the job
execution.2: The ability to overcome obstacles or difficulties encountered
execution.3: The ability to assume responsibilities, to assume errors in the activity
execution.4: The capacity for analysis and synthesis, creativity and initiative
execution.5: The ability to work in a team, to contribute through effective participation
execution.6: The score established in compartment 1) "Professional competence" (M¹)
execution.7: The ability to promote and respect the rules of conduct at work and outside it, in relations with managers, colleagues and other people
execution.8: The ability to correctly execute the provisions of normative acts and service discipline
execution.9: Disciplinary sanctions (It will be scored: warning/observation – 2 points; other sanctions – 1 point; absence – 3 or 4, as the case may be)
execution.10: The score established in compartment 2) "Service duct" (M²)
execution.12: The score established in compartment 3) "Individual goals" (M³):
execution.17: Arithmetic average from basic training sections 1 – 4: (Pb)

management.1: The ability to plan and organize the activity of the managed structure:
management.2: The ability to effectively lead, monitor and manage the work of staff:
management.3: The ability to control and supervise the execution of decisions:
management.4: The ability to motivate and encourage the activity of the staff, maintaining an optimal work climate:
management.5: The ability to develop the professional skills of the staff:
management.6: The score set for compartment 1) "Managerial competence" (M¹):
management.7: The ability to promote the rules of conduct and ensure their compliance by subordinates:
management.8: The ability to promote and strengthen through one's performance the public image of the institution it represents:
management.9: Disciplinary sanctions (It will be scored: warning/observation – 2 points; other sanctions – 1 point; absence – 3 or 4, as the case may be):
management.10: The score established in compartment 2) "Service duct" (M²):
management.12: The score established in compartment 3) "Individual goals" (M³):
management.17: Arithmetic average from basic training sections 1 – 4: (Pb)

counter-signer-comments.1: the evaluation procedure and the requirements established by the Regulation were respected
counter-signer-comments.2: was verifying the correctness of the information entered in the evaluation sheet
counter-signer-comments.3: the periods and deadlines for carrying out the evaluation procedures were respected
counter-signer-comments.4: the assessments recorded in the evaluation form by the evaluator correspond to reality
